data.homeworkTitle: 第二十九章 良性前列腺增生病人的护理

questions.title: 老年男性患者饮酒后出现急性尿潴留其首要处理是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"针刺","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"肌肉注射卡巴胆碱","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"耻骨上膀胱造瘘","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"膀胱穿刺","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"试行导尿并留置导尿管","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 病人，男，62岁，进行性排尿困难，夜尿次数增多，直肠指诊发现前列明显增大，应首先考虑为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"膀胱癌","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"膀胱结石","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"前列腺增生","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"管狭窄","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"膀胱结核","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 某男性，61岁，良性前列腺增生，无明显症状，无残余尿。目前主要的治疗是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"观察，定期门诊复查","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"药物治疗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"手术治疗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"激光治疗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"放置前列腺尿道支架","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者，男性，68岁，进行性排尿困难1年，夜尿频。直肠指检前列腺明显肿大，神经系统无异常，F18导尿管可以插入膀胱，残余尿70ml，患者年轻时曾患过“肺结核”当时治愈。该患者可能的疾病是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"膀胱结核","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"膀胱癌","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"前列腺增生","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"尿管狭窄","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者男性，65岁。排尿困难3年，逐渐加重。近两个月夜间尿液不自主流出。应诊断为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"真性尿失禁","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"压力性尿失禁","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"充盈性尿失禁","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"急迫性尿失禁","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"麻痹性尿失禁","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，71岁，前列腺增生，择期行经尿道前列腺切除术。术后4小时病人烦躁不安、恶心呕吐、呼吸困难。病人可能出现什么并发症
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"TURP综合征","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"急性肾衰、急性肺水肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"休克","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"全身感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"尿潴留","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者男性，60岁，排尿犹豫，夜尿增多，检查前列腺体积较大、较硬，应做下列哪项检查以排除前列腺癌可能
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"血清甲胎蛋白（AFP）","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"血清癌胚抗原（CEA）","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"清前列腺特异抗原（PSA）","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"直肠指检","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"B超","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者男性，58岁，排尿犹豫、费力，夜尿增多。诊断为前列腺增生。行前列腺摘除。术后1周内护理，不妥的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"安置两根导尿管","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"膀胱冲洗液自气囊导尿管注入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"冲洗液从耻骨上造口管流出","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"病人腹胀，应肛管排气","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"冲洗液中必要时加入止血剂","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者男性，58岁，排尿犹豫、费力，夜尿增多。诊断为前列腺增生。行B超检查除进一步明确诊断外，还要确定
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"血尿的程度","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"尿频的程度","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"排尿困难的程度","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"有否尿潴留","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"残余尿的多少","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 病人，男，75岁，诊断为前列腺增生，昨日化验检查发现肾功能不佳。护士应该采取下列哪项措施
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"留置尿管持续引流","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"禁蛋白质饮食","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"积极行术前准备","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"配合医生行耻骨上膀胱穿刺","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"教育病人慎服对肾脏有损害药物","IsAnswer":false}]
